metadata.title: CVE-2018-10923 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: It was found that the "mknod" call derived from mknod(2) can create filespointing to devices on a glusterfs server node. An authenticated attackercould use this to create an arbitrary device and read data from any deviceattached to the glusterfs server node.

criterions.comment: glusterfs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
